price: Ni nyinyi mlio uumba mti wake au Sisi ndio Waumbaji?
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ
footnotes: Ni nyinyi ndio mlio uotesha mti wake, na mkautia ndani ya huo mti moto, au ni Sisi ndio tulio uumbia hivyo, kadhaalika?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: a-antum anshatum shajaratahā am naḥnu al-munshiūna
